EmailTemplate.description: Notice to customer that CS bill is 60 days past due
EmailTemplate.name: Branded BluewaveLogo 60 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Account is 60 Days Past Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
COVID-19 Information: We recognize that the unprecedented COVID-19 situation may be causing financial difficulty. Please contact our Customer Care team if you have concerns about making payments for your BlueWave Community Solar subscription.
Your BlueWave account is 60 days past due.
Your outstanding account balance is {!Account.Total_Outstanding_Balance_Merge__c}.
Please make a payment as soon as possible. To check the status of your account and make a payment online, please login to your BlueWave Portal. You can also access your portal at bluewavesolar.com.
Log Into Your Portal Here
If you do not make a payment within 7 days of receiving this notice, BlueWave will terminate your agreement as soon as your utility allows us to remove you from the project.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
